oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - 1987-06-13 - WSM
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Excerpt from Grand Ole Opry Show from June 13, 1987 from 10:00-11:00. Featuring Jim Ed Brown (host, performer), Hank Snow (performer), Skeeter Davis (performer), Justin Tubb (performer), and George Hamilton IV (performer) on radio station WSM (Nashville, Tenn.) According to tape case label, this segment features the last appearance of Howard Forrester on the Opry.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Jim Ed Brown; Hank Snow; Skeeter Davis; Justin Tubb; George Hamilton IV
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Test tones -- [Unidentified] talks -- Heil HVAC commercial ([Unidentified]) -- Jim Ed Brown talks -- Scarlet Ribbons (Jim Ed Brown) -- Closing statement (Jim Ed Brown and [Unidentified]) -- Sweet Sue chicken and dumplings jingle and commercial -- [Unidentified tune] -- [Unidentified] introduces Hank Snow -- Between Fire And Water (Hank Snow) -- Hank Snow talks -- Coca Cola jingle and commercial -- Hank Snow introduces Skeeter Davis -- Skeeter Davis talks -- My Last Date (With You) (Skeeter Davis) -- Silver Threads And Golden Needles (Skeeter Davis) -- The End Of The World (Skeeter Davis) -- [Unidentified] introduces Justin Tubb -- Justin Tubb talks -- Be Better To Your Baby (Justin Tubb) -- Coca Cola jingle and commercial -- [Unidentified] introduces Pat Travis -- Pat Travis talks about her book -- Hank Snow talks -- Hanks Snow introduces George Hamilton IV -- Hamilton talks -- Forever Young (George Hamilton IV) (incomplete)
